actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that volunteer firemen shall not be considered employees for purposes of such act.

summary.text: Exempts volunteer firemen from the overtime pay requirements of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide that volunteer firemen shall not be considered employees for purposes of such act.
